long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
2048 Classic Offline Version (Only 1MB)

Play 2048 on your Google Chrome Browser. Use your arrow keys to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one!

1. Install extension
2. Click the 2048 icon on the Chrome extension toolbar 
and then we will open a 2048 for you to play the game! You donâ€™t need to do anything else! You also can play 2048 from any Chrome Tab.
Have fun!
